definition: generally/in general
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
ordinary/commonplace/mundane/temporal/of the material world (as opposed to supernatural or immortal levels)/every/all/whatever/altogether/gist/outline/note of Chinese musical scale
a rough acquaintance with sth

sentences.english: Generally speaking , the most pianists all accepted the professional training in the year one.
sentences.chinese: 大凡鋼琴家都在早年接受過專業訓練。

sentences.english: Almost all the beautiful things people can be most exciting, heart health pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 大凡美麗的事物，均可讓人怦然心動，心生愉悅。

sentences.english: Generally write novels, and who do not want to come up with a "great Chinese novel"?
sentences.chinese: 大凡寫小說的，誰不想弄出一部“偉大的中國小說”？

sentences.english: May engage in the arts are generally similar Nga some good.
sentences.chinese: 也許大凡搞藝術的人都有些類似的雅好。

sentences.english: Individuals who succeed have a belief in the power of commitment.
sentences.chinese: 大凡成功者，無不相信全力以赴的力量。

sentences.english: Mostly successful cabaret, needed a large quantity to know of the private come to common construction.
sentences.chinese: 大凡成功的酒店，需要有一大批有識之士來共同建設。

sentences.english: When people die in hot weather, they usually foam at the mouth just as he did.
sentences.chinese: 大凡人死在熱天，就會冒出這種白沫來，我見過。

sentences.english: Trade generally lively when enter the arena talent is promising achieve earnings of short-term price difference .
sentences.chinese: 大凡交易熱鬧時進場，纔有希望獲得短期的差價收益。

sentences.english: Therefore, a in a media appearances in evidence chance, he never pass.
sentences.chinese: 因此，大凡有在媒體露臉留痕的機會，他都絕不放過。

sentences.english: Remember that this usually comes from doing the things that most people don't do.
sentences.chinese: 記住這大凡來自做大大都人不做的事情。

sentences.english: Left to themselves, things tend to go from bad to worse.
sentences.chinese: 大凡事物，聽其自然就會每況愈下。

sentences.english: Generally those who drink will cause traffic accidents.
sentences.chinese: 大凡酒後開車的都易出車禍。

sentences.english: In a sexist male society, that's a common illness.
sentences.chinese: 大凡男權社會的男人，都有這種通病。
